mapper.select: SELECT @ROWNUM := @ROWNUM+1 AS rnum ,d.idx ,d.writer ,d.content ,date_format(d.reg_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS regDt ,date_format(d.udt_dt,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS udtDt FROM DIARY d, (SELECT @ROWNUM := 0) r WHERE d.writer = 'Lee' ORDER BY idx DESC
